author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has grown exponentially since the release of Iron Man in 2008. Now, nearly two decades later in 2025, the MCU timeline has been updated via Disney Plus. Fans can now see how more than fifty titles in the multimedia franchise are chronologically organized by the studio. This updated version of the [...]

The post Disney Plus Reveals Updated MCU Timeline appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Plus Reveals Updated MCU Timeline

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Saw film franchise will reportedly no longer be under the control of Twisted Pictures. The production label, which was rumored to have been suffering from disputes that kept Saw 11 from happening, is said to be giving their share of rights to Blumhouse. As shared via Deadline, this would be “a deal that will [...]

The post Blumhouse Acquires ‘Saw’ Rights From Twisted Pictures appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Blumhouse Acquires ‘Saw’ Rights From Twisted Pictures

author: Mark Salcido
description:
Much like the films’ main character, the John Wick franchise won’t die. That’s not necessarily a bad idea for anyone who enjoys action set pieces that feature gun fights, realistic hand-to-hand combat, and even the thinnest of plots. John Wick 4 showcased the completed arc of Keanu Reeves’s character to a somewhat satisfying degree. However, [...]

title: ‘Ballerina’ Review: A Huge Mess With Decent Action
